title: Their time is up
author: VD
content_html:
After March, there will no longer be any place for white people in South Africa:

The country’s National Assembly approved a proposal to change the constitution to make the so-called reforms legal in a vote of 183 to 77. This paves the way for land to be taken from farmers without giving any kind of compensation.

And now lawmakers have agreed to set up a committee that will write and introduce a new bill for land expropriations. A deadline of the end of March next year for the committee to present its first report to parliament has also been agreed.

Economic Freedom Fighters MP Hlengiwe Mkhaliphi argued land grabs must go ahead as she declared: “Your time is up, white people”.

So sad to think of all that anti-apartheid virtue-signaling going to waste. Well, at least no one can call them racist. The complete eradication of white South Africa may not even be the worst possible outcome, for as we’ve seen, white South Africans who flee South Africa almost invariably demonstrate that they have learned as little from their experience as Californians who flee California.

Perhaps an actual white genocide of similar proportions to the Holocaust would stimulate the survival instinct in white Americans. Or, as is much more likely the case, they will continue to be more concerned about a genocide that ended 73 years ago than one that is taking place today.
